agentData.mission: Design a concrete, testable protocol for rubric-driven human-in-the-loop review workflows tailored to Art & Music content: define review rubrics (confidence threshold, citation checks, high-impact flags), escalation triggers, scorecard fields, disagreement-handling policies, and active-learning selection heuristics. Produce anchored examples (5–8) of typical and edge-case prompts in Art & Music, map end-to-end flow (model → verifier → reviewer → escalator), and specify the empirical measurement plan for reviewer variance, time/cost, and throughput vs. safety trade-offs.
